name: Loana Tito Nogueira
content: Loana Tito Nogueira Loana Tito Nogueira HomePage Navegação do Site[Ignorar] Home Teaching Curriculum | Loana Tito Nogueira Publications | Loana Tito Nogueira Students | Loana Tito Nogueira Contact Me | Loana Tito Nogueira Barra Lateral[Ignorar] Loana Tito Nogueira Loana T. Nogueira is an associate professor at the Computing Institute of Universidade Federal Fluminense (UFF). She holds a Ph.D (2003) and a M.S.(1999) degree in Systems Engineering and Computer Science from COPPE/UFRJ, and she also holds a licentiate (1996) degree in Mathematics from UERJ. She had a productivity research grant level 2 from CNPq for 12 years and a Young Scientist research grant from FAPERJ from 2012 to 2018. She has published over 70 papers in journals and conferences. She received the 3rd best Ph.D. Thesis Award of the Brazilian Computer Society in 2004. She has served as editor of Latin 2008: Theoretical Informatics and has also served as program organizer committee member of other conferences. It is important to mention that as Scientific initiation advisor, her student got the best work award.Her main research area is discrete mathematics, more specifically in Graph Theory. © Loana Nogueira 2019 [Enviar Para Cima]
